mapper.select: select pav.*,pa.name,pa.type from pms_product_attribute_value pav LEFT JOIN pms_product_attribute pa on pa.id=pav.product_attribute_id where pav.product_id=#{id} and pa.type=1

select * from pms_product_attribute where product_attribute_category_id = ( select pa.product_attribute_category_id from pms_product_attribute pa left join pms_product_attribute_value pav on pa.id=pav.product_attribute_id where pav.product_id=#{id} and pa.type=0 LIMIT 1 ) and type = 0 ORDER BY sort DESC
